mapper.insert: insert into t_warning (warningName, warningThreshold, warningUnit,createTime,useable) values (#{warningName},#{warningThreshold},#{warningUnit},NOW(),1);
mapper.update: update t_warning set warningName=#{warningName},warningThreshold=#{warningThreshold}, warningUnit=#{warningUnit} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select warningThreshold from t_warning where id=#{id}

select * from t_warning order by createTime desc
limit #{start}, #{count}
mapper.delete: update t_warning set useable=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_warning set useable=1 where id=#{id}
